org.zaproxy.zap.utils

Class TableExportAction<T extends JTable>

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.AbstractAction
      • org.zaproxy.zap.utils.TableExportAction<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the table.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, Serializable, Cloneable, EventListener, Action

    public class TableExportAction<T extends JTable>
extends AbstractAction
    An AbstractAction to facilitate exporting tables (as shown) to a file (such as CSV).

    Filters, sorting, column order, and column visibility may all impact the data exported.

    Since:
    2.7.0
    See Also:
    TableExportButton, Serialized Form

      • getColumnNames

        protected List<String> getColumnNames()
        Gets a List of (visible) column names for the given table.

        Called when exporting the column names.

        Returns:
        the List of column names, never null.

      • getRowCells

        protected List<Object> getRowCells(int row)
        Gets the cell values (in view order) for the given row.

        Called for each (visible) row that's being exported.

        Parameters:
        row - the row, in view coordinates.
        Returns:
        a List containing the values of the cells for the given row, never null.
